short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Import prospects from Salesforce to ConnectAndSell!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ImportNow lets the user import prospects in to ConnectAndSell and connect with those prospects immediately accelerating your sales.

You must have an account with ConnectAndSell, and be signed in for the extension to work.
